title: 要是动物有感情【ItsHarryAndJerry】
author: ayaya
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ayaya 于 2013-12-9 10:47 编辑 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjQ1Njg0MDU2/v.swfhttp://static.hdslb.com/miniloader.swf?aid=866157&page=1

对不起了，至少到圣诞节前都没有翻译了.....（坚持1个礼拜）

replies.author: 星E君
replies.txt_content: 我们好奇这么简单的英文还需要翻译么。。。

replies.txt_content:

还是有小学生玩家的嘛=，=全年龄向

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content:
天迹灬战狂神 发表于 2013-12-9 08:44 
我们好奇这么简单的英文还需要翻译么。。。
前几个视频好几个抱怨看不懂...
然后有一些时候属于外国口语，中国学的英语完全不行（那中国英语到外国也都听不懂...）

replies.author: 星E君
replies.txt_content:
ayaya 发表于 2013-12-8 20:16 
前几个视频好几个抱怨看不懂...
然后有一些时候属于外国口语，中国学的英语完全不行（那中国英语到外国也 ...
很多口语口音都是美国的。。。

而中国学的都是英国的。。。。

本来就有区别。。。。

我反正在美国留学听惯了。。。。

replies.txt_content:
If Mobs Had Fellings

00:15Hello Sheep
00:17I'm going to kill you
0018what!why?
0021THAT HURT!
0023WHY DID YOU DO THAT!
0024stand still!
0026I'm going to kill you!
0028WHAT HAVE I DONE TO YOU?
0030 nothing
0031 I just need your wool
0033 BUT WHAT ABOUT ME?
0035 I WILL DIE!
0036 I HAVE A WIFE AND CHILDREN!
0037 I'M TOO YOUNG TO DIE!
0039 listen
0040 this won't take long
0042 I promise, you won't fell anything
0045 WAIT!
0046 LOOK AT THIS!

Summer vacation in Paris!

Halloween 2012
蓝羊围观红羊上厕
First time on the potty
粉色羊站在红砖上
The Love Of My Life
woooooooooo这只羊居然不是方的
Christmas! New camera :D
照片看完了
0113 aww

0116 you have such a nice family

0120 I was only thinking about myself
0123 forgetting that mobs have fellings too

0129 it's okey
0131 I invite you to dinner at my place
0134 Thank you
0135 I'll be there tonight!
0138 黑屏显示Later that night...
0143 thanks for having me
0144 this food is great!
0146 thank you for not killing my daddy!
0150 haha
0151 what a cute kid

0157 nice sheep farm dude!
woooooooo终于结束了·
老纸不停的暂停扣字用了二十分钟····
从9：54开始到现在···

replies.txt_content:

If Mobs Had Fellings

00:15Hello Sheep
喂·那只羊
00:17I'm going to kill you
我要宰了你
0018what!why?
什么!为什么啊?
0021THAT HURT!
痛!
0023WHY DID YOU DO THAT!
为什么你要这么做!
0024stand still!
站住别动!
0026I'm going to kill you!
我要宰了你啊~!
0028WHAT HAVE I DONE TO YOU?
我有对你做过什么呒?
0030 nothing
没什么
0031 I just need your wool
我只是想要你的羊毛
0033 BUT WHAT ABOUT ME?
但是我呢?
0035 I WILL DIE!
我会死的!
0036 I HAVE A WIFE AND CHILDREN!
我有一个妻子和孩子们!
0037 I'M TOO YOUNG TO DIE!
我死的太年轻了!
0039 listen
听着
0040 this won't take long
这不会持续很长时间
0042 I promise, you won't fell anything
我保证,你不会感觉到什么
0045 WAIT!
等等!
0046 LOOK AT THIS!
看看这个!
丢出来一本书、
上面写着 Photo Album
相册
一张四色羊的照片下面写着
Taking the kids to the park
带着孩子们去公园
巴黎铁塔的照片下面写着
Summer vacation in Paris!
暑假在巴黎!
黑色礼帽
Halloween 2012
2012年的万圣节
蓝羊围观红羊上厕
First time on the potty
第一次在坐便器上(发呆←_←)
粉色羊站在红砖上
The Love Of My Life
我生命中的最爱(这羊的妻子)
woooooooooo这只羊居然不是方的
Christmas! New camera :D
圣诞节!新相机 ｡◕‿◕｡
照片看完了
0113 aww
啊··(感叹词)
0114 that's so sweet
这真甜蜜
0116 you have such a nice family
你有一个温馨的家庭
0118 I made a mistake
我犯下了一个错误
0120 I was only thinking about myself
我只想到了我自己(我只会自私的为自己考虑)
0123 forgetting that mobs have fellings too
而忘记了动物也有感情
0127 please forgive me
请原谅我
0129 it's okey
好啊·没问题
0131 I invite you to dinner at my place
我邀请你去我家共进晚餐
0134 Thank you
谢谢
0135 I'll be there tonight!
今晚我会来的
0138 黑屏显示Later that night...
等到晚上···
0143 thanks for having me
谢谢你邀请我
0144 this food is great!
这食物很美味!
0146 thank you for not killing my daddy!
谢谢你不杀我的爹地!
0150 haha
哈哈
0151 what a cute kid
好可爱的男♂孩♂纸啊
0153 入口处跳出来一个手持钻石剑的家伙
0157 nice sheep farm dude!
真是漂亮的羊场啊,伙计!
